sources.title: The Young Savages (1961)
sources.description: A district attorney investigates the racially charged case of three teenagers accused of the murder of a blind Puerto Rican boy.

sources.title: The Young Savages (1961)
sources.description: A district attorney investigates the racially charged case of three teenagers accused of the murder of a blind Puerto Rican boy. Watch on RetroFlix.org: https://retroflix.org/the-young-savages-1961/

sources.title: The Young Savages (1961) Burt Lancaster Â· Dina Merrill
sources.description: Burt Lancaster plays a prosecutor in the trial of juvenile murderers from the Harlem slums. Although a conviction would boost his career, he changes sides when he receives evidence of one of the defendants' innocence.

metadata.Plot: A district attorney investigates the racially charged case of three teenagers accused of the murder of a blind Puerto Rican boy. He begins to discover that the facts in the case aren't exactly as they seem to be.
metadata.Writer: Edward Anhalt, J.P. Miller, Evan Hunter
metadata.Actors: Burt Lancaster, Dina Merrill, Edward Andrews
